features.name: Visibility Control
features.description: Allows toggling the visibility of the drawer using the 'open' prop.

features.name: Customizable Content
features.description: Supports rendering of any React content via the 'children' prop.

features.name: Styling Flexibility
features.description: Enables customization with the 'style' prop for inline styles.

features.name: Class Name Support
features.description: Allows adding additional CSS class names through the 'className' prop.

features.name: Responsive Design
features.description: Designed to integrate seamlessly into responsive UI layouts.

props.name: children
props.description: Content to be rendered inside the drawer.

props.name: className
props.description: Additional CSS class names for the drawer.

props.name: open
props.description: Determines whether the drawer is visible or hidden.

features.name: Structural Wrapper
features.description: Provides a container to organize and group content inside the drawer.

features.name: Custom Styling
features.description: Allows the application of custom styles and class names.

props.name: children
props.description: Content to be rendered inside the container.

props.name: className
props.description: Additional CSS class names for the container.

features.name: Interactive Area
features.description: Designed to hold interactive elements like buttons or links.

features.name: Event Handling

features.name: Styling Options

props.name: children
